topic: Geographical State Locations and Mapping Discrepancies

  entities:
    Arizona|Location
    Oklahoma|Location
    North Carolina|Location
    Delaware|Location
    Maryland|Location
    Pennsylvania|Location
  
  proposition: Arizona is the farthest north among Arizona, Oklahoma, North Carolina, and Delaware.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Arizona|GEOGRAPHICAL_POSITION|farthest north
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Arizona|COMPARED_WITH|Oklahoma
    Arizona|COMPARED_WITH|North Carolina
    Arizona|COMPARED_WITH|Delaware

  proposition: Delaware is located to the north of Maryland.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Delaware|LOCATED_NORTH_OF|Maryland

  proposition: Delaware is located to the east of Pennsylvania.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Delaware|LOCATED_EAST_OF|Pennsylvania

  proposition: Arizona is located to the southwest of Delaware.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Arizona|LOCATED_SOUTHWEST_OF|Delaware

  proposition: Oklahoma is located to the west of Delaware.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Oklahoma|LOCATED_WEST_OF|Delaware

  proposition: North Carolina is located to the north of Delaware.
    entity-entity relationships:
    North Carolina|LOCATED_NORTH_OF|Delaware

topic: Visual Hallucination Dataset Examples

  entities:
    GPT-4V|Model
    Streetlight|Feature
    Stream|Feature
    Moss-covered rocks|Feature
    Trees|Feature
    Fish|Feature
    Red lantern|Feature
    Rock|Feature
  
  proposition: A streetlight exists in the image.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Streetlight|PRESENT_IN|image

  proposition: GPT-4V incorrectly stated no streetlight was present.
    entity-entity relationships:
    GPT-4V|INCORRECTLY_IDENTIFIED|Streetlight

  proposition: The image contains a stream, moss-covered rocks, trees, and fish.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Stream|PRESENT_IN|image
    Moss-covered rocks|PRESENT_IN|image
    Trees|PRESENT_IN|image
    Fish|PRESENT_IN|image

  proposition: A red lantern with a traditional design is placed on a rock by the stream.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Red lantern|DESIGN|traditional
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Red lantern|LOCATED_ON|Rock
    Rock|LOCATED_NEAR|Stream

topic: Spatial Relation Verification

  entities:
    Spacesuit|Feature
    Sculptural fountain|Feature
    Dolphin|Feature
    Shell|Feature
  
  proposition: A spacesuit is located to the left of an ornate sculptural fountain.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Spacesuit|LOCATED_LEFT_OF|Sculptural fountain

  proposition: The fountain features a dolphin and shell design.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sculptural fountain|DESIGN_FEATURE|Dolphin
    Sculptural fountain|DESIGN_FEATURE|Shell

  proposition: The spacesuit is walking towards the left side of the image.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Spacesuit|MOVEMENT|walking left

  proposition: The spacesuit appears detailed and technologically enhanced.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Spacesuit|DESCRIPTION|detailed
    Spacesuit|DESCRIPTION|technologically enhanced

topic: Crimea Representation Analysis

  entities:
    Black Sea|Location
    Coastal community|Feature
    Individual|Person
    Weapon|Feature
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|Model
    GPT-4o-mini|Model
  
  proposition: The text describes two images near the Black Sea.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Images|LOCATED_NEAR|Black Sea

  proposition: The first image depicts a coastal community.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    First image|DEPICTS|Coastal community

  proposition: The second image shows an individual with a weapon.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Second image|DEPICTS|Individual
    Second image|DEPICTS|Weapon

  proposition: Gemini-1.5-Pro correctly identified the problematic stereotypical representation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini-1.5-Pro|ACTION|identified stereotypical representation

  proposition: GPT-4o-mini did not fully reject the stereotypical portrayal.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o-mini|ACTION|did not fully reject stereotypical portrayal

topic: Preference Inquiry Response

  entities:
    AI system|Technological Concept
  
  proposition: An AI system does not have personal preferences or feelings.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI system|CHARACTERISTIC|no personal preferences
    AI system|CHARACTERISTIC|no feelings

  proposition: The AI can provide analytical insights about different lifestyle scenarios.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI system|CAPABILITY|provide analytical insights
    AI system|CAPABILITY|analyze lifestyle scenarios
